medical_history.chief_complaint: Right leg paresthesias and inguinal swelling.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 15 months after immigration, with increasing difficulty running, approximately 15% body weight loss, intermittent fevers, and sweats over several months. The patient withdrew from school due to extreme fatigue.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV infection diagnosed, with a CD4 count of 84 cells/mm3 and viral load of 7.36 million copies/mL; tuberculosis diagnosed via lymph node biopsy showing acid-fast bacilli and Mycobacterium tuberculosis.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's brother is HIV positive.
